Module AM25_myShelfie
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class RMIServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.RMIServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
RMIServerInterface, Runnable, Remote
public class RMIServer extends Object implements Runnable, RMIServerInterface
is the server that concretely has to handle RMI connections with the players

      port - it's the port that will be used for the communication

      public void setInGameStatus(String lobby)
      function used to correctly initialize a rmiClient to be in a lobby
      Parameters:

    • checkClientAliveness

      public void checkClientAliveness()
      For each client a thread is created that checks if the client is reachable. Every second the server checks whether there are new client online that needs to be pinged. For each ping to be discarded it's considered a timeout of 5 seconds. Between two ping is waited another second. If the client is unreachable for 3 consecutive iterations it is disconnected from the server

    • sendMsgToAllRMI

      public void sendMsgToAllRMI(Serializable msg, Lobby lobby)
      sendMsgToAllRMI is the method used to send a message to every client that is connected through rmi connection to a specific lobby
      Parameters:
      msg - is the forwarded message, it needs to be serializable
      lobby - is the target Lobby

    • sendMsgToClient

      public void sendMsgToClient(RMIClientInterface rmiClient, ServerMessage msg)
      sendMsgToClient is the method used to send a message to a specific rmi client
      Parameters:
      rmiClient - is the destinatari of the message
      msg - is the serializable message

    • receiveMsgFromClient

      public void receiveMsgFromClient(Serializable arg)
      receiveMsgFromClient is the method used to handle the requests that arrives from the clients in the form of rmi messages. It's responsible for the communication between the client and the controller in the server
      Specified by:
      receiveMsgFromClient in interface RMIServerInterface
      Parameters:
      arg - is the serializable message received from the client

    • register

      public void register(RMIClientInterface rmiClient) throws RemoteException
      register is the method used to add a new rmi client to the list of the ones using this server
      Specified by:
      register in interface RMIServerInterface
      Parameters:
      rmiClient - is the interface of the client to add
      Throws:
      RemoteException - whenever an error regarding the player connection happened

    • checkAliveness

      public boolean checkAliveness() throws RemoteException
      function used to check the server reachability
      Specified by:
      checkAliveness in interface RMIServerInterface
      Returns:
      true
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if not reachable

    • manageDisconnection

      public void manageDisconnection(RMIClientInterface rmiClient)
      manageDisconnection handles the disconnections of rmi clients. If the lobby where the client was has only a player left the lobby will be closed after a timeout and the remaining player will be disconnected from the lobby.
      Parameters:
      rmiClient - is the interface of the client that is disconnected
